result.reason: Adding a debug dump feature will significantly aid in troubleshooting user issues by standardizing the collection of environment details and logs.
result.approach: Create a `DebugInfoCollector` class to gather OS version, .NET runtime info, application version, and recent log file content. Add a 'Generate Debug Report' menu item under 'Help' to trigger this collection and save it to a file.
